data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="PersistentCookieDecisionNode" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="org/forgerock/openam/auth/nodes/PersistentCookieDecisionNode"  i18nKey="nodeDescription"  resourceName="PersistentCookieDecisionNode"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/PersistentCookieDecisionNode" ><Organization><SubSchema i18nKey="nodeDescription"  inheritance="multiple"  name="instance"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  validate="yes" ><AttributeSchema i18nKey="useHttpOnlyCookie"  name="useHttpOnlyCookie"  order="400"  resourceName="useHttpOnlyCookie"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>true</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="hmacSigningKey"  name="hmacSigningKey"  order="500"  resourceName="hmacSigningKey"  syntax="password"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0 HmacSigningKeyValidator1" ></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="enforceClientIp"  name="enforceClientIp"  order="200"  resourceName="enforceClientIp"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>false</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="persistentCookieName"  name="persistentCookieName"  order="600"  resourceName="persistentCookieName"  syntax="string"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>session-jwt</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="idleTimeout"  name="idleTimeout"  order="100"  resourceName="idleTimeout"  syntax="number"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>5</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="useSecureCookie"  name="useSecureCookie"  order="300"  resourceName="useSecureCookie"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>true</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema name="RequiredValueValidator0"  syntax="string"  type="validator" ><DefaultValues><Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema name="HmacSigningKeyValidator1"  syntax="string"  type="validator" ><DefaultValues><Value>org.forgerock.openam.auth.nodes.validators.HmacSigningKeyValidator</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema></SubSchema></Organization></Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
